title: Breaking down trades of DeAndre Hopkins & Stefon Diggs + Free Agency News
itunes:title: Breaking down trades of DeAndre Hopkins & Stefon Diggs + Free Agency News
description:
DJ and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode. To start off, the guys discuss the Panthers giving QB Cam Newton permission to seek a trade (1:38) and how the Panthers are finalizing a deal with QB Teddy Bridgewater (4:08). Next, the pair analyzes the trades of WR DeAndre Hopkins to the Cardinals and WR Stefon Diggs to the Bills, while looking at what it means for each team involved (6:47). Then, the duo reacts to the trade of DT DeForest Buckner to the Colts and discuss what it means for the 49ers (15:14). After that, the guys talk about all the moves the Dolphins have made in free agency so far (19:55). Then, the pair look at the Bears (24:00) and Raiders moves in free agency (26:15). To wrap up the show, Bucky tells DJ about a pass rusher in this upcoming draft that is a tough evaluation (28:15).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
